content: So now I've finally gotten my References in the returned list of resources to have the _included Resource itself storedusing Reference.setResource(includedResource). But I'm not seeing those resources in the output. Has anyone experienced similar issues.

Hmm.. Can you try disabling the server's automatic bundle include handling to see if that helps? I wonder if there's something wonky going on there. Basically call the following method on your RestfulServer class (say in the init method):

setBundleInclusionRule(BundleInclusionRule.BASED_ON_RESOURCE_PRESENCE);
